'''A Thank-You Letter to All Travelers''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 3.2]].

Dear Travelers,

Thanks to your support, Genshin Impact received the "PlayStation®Partner Awards 2022 GRAND AWARD."

We will be giving out Primogems ×800 from December 4 to December 7. Thank you for your support!

==How to Claim Rewards==
200 [[Primogem]]s shall be given out to Travelers via in-game mail at 00:00 (server time) each day from December 4 to December 7.
These Primogems can be claimed at any time before the end of Version 3.3. All Travelers who have reached [[Adventure Rank]] 7 or above can claim a total of 800 Primogems via in-game mail.
